title: Donald Trump removes 29 career diplomats from ambassadorial positions including US Ambassador in Colombo
byline: The Trump administration is recalling nearly 30 career diplomats from ambassadorial and other senior embassy posts including the US Ambassador in Colombo as it moves to reshape the U.S. diplomatic posture abroad with personnel deemed fully supportive of President Donald Trump’s “America First” priorities.

title: Govt managing the economy in a way that delivers tangible benefits to all Sri Lankans: PM Harini
byline: The present government’s policy is not to provide luxury to a limited number of people, but to manage the economy in a way that delivers tangible benefits to the public, Prime Minister Dr. Harini Amarasuriya stated.

title: Oil price gains after US interception of Venezuelan oil tanker over weekend
byline: Oil prices gained on Monday in early Asian trading hours after the U.S. intercepted a Venezuelan oil tanker over the weekend.

title: Few showers expected in parts of the island today
byline: A few showers may occur in Uva province and in Ampara, Batticaloa, Matale, Nuwara-Eliya and Hambantota districts.
